bibl.title: A Woman's Unease about Her Property. Avec résumé en anglais.

series.title: Bulletin of the American Society of Papyrologists
BASP

bibl.note: Edition of P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 15061 recto, a 4th century letter or draft of a petition with "trendy" (late antique) turns of phrase that are used to express its author's unease regarding her property. Provenance unknown.- Pp. 90-91: Appendix. Edition of P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 15061 verso, a seemingly unrelated account of money in talents and thousands (of drachmas).
